message.entry: Expected input number {0,number,integer}, {1}, to be an emitter config struct array.
For input number {0,number,integer}, {1}, expected an emitter configuration struct array.
Matching monostatic emitter configuration with EmitterIndex of {1,number,integer} was not found in the input emitter configuration struct array, {0}.
Setting the {0} property is not permitted for this sensor.

entry.note: Operate sensor in electronic support measures (ESM) mode
Scan mode with only mechanical scanning
Scan mode with only electronic scanning
Scan mode with both mechanical and electronic scanning

message.entry: Expected ConfusionMatrix to be of size {0}-by-{0}, a length-{0} vector, or scalar.
The rows of ConfusionMatrix must sum to 1, and all entries must be in the interval [0, 1].
